%text Given two functions $f(x)$ and $g(x)$, \underline\text{if their derivatives are defined}, then % \begin{align}
\frac{d}{dx}\left[ f(x) + g(x)\right] &= \frac{d}{dx}f(x) + \frac{d}{dx}g(x) \\ \frac{d}{dx}\left[ f(x) - g(x)\right] &= \frac{d}{dx}f(x) - \frac{d}{dx}g(x) \end{align} %text %
